dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2966 IH: Reducing Poverty through Employment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Smith of Missouri (for himself and Mrs. Noem) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the purposes of TANF to include reducing poverty by increasing employment entry, retention, and advancement.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Reducing Poverty through Employment Act.

section.header: Purposes of the TANF Program to Include Reducing Poverty
section.text: Section 401(a) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 601(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: reduce poverty by increasing employment entry, retention, and advancement.

section.text: The amendment made by this Act shall take effect on October 1, 2015.
